citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an environmental enhancement plan in place to promote the overall psychological well-being of
the birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for the environmental
enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of the avian species maintained at the facility. This plan must
address the social needs of the birds, their physical environment and any special considerations for isolated but social
species. This plan should be written in regards to use of enrichment within industry standards and approved by the
attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available for future inspections.
Correct by: April 5, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative,
